workshop.title: Oracle Data Safe Workshop
workshop.description: This workshop will show you how to get started with Oracle Data Safe.

labs.title: Read Me First
labs.description: Oracle Data Safe Getting Started Workshop Overview

labs.title: Lab 1: Viewing a Registered Target Database
labs.description: Sign in to Oracle Data Safe and view the dashboard and a registered target database.

labs.title: Lab 2: Provisioning Audit and Alert Policies
labs.description: Collect audit data and generate alerts in Oracle Data Safe.

labs.title: Lab 3: Assessing Database Configurations and Users
labs.description: Run a Security Assessment and User Assessment jobs and analyze the reports.

labs.title: Lab 4: Analyzing Alerts and Audit Reports
labs.description: Review and analyze alerts and audit reports and create a failed logins report.

labs.title: Lab 5: Discovering and Masking Sensitive Data
labs.description: Run data discovery and data masking jobs to create a sensitive data model and mask sensitive data in a target database.
